info.title: Data Potluck API's
info.description: Our API allows users to effortlessly explore a wide range of courses offered by various Colleges and Schools at Arizona State University. With intuitive endpoints and comprehensive filters, users can easily navigate through different academic programs, view course details, and access essential information, empowering them to make informed decisions about their educational journey at ASU.

get.summary: Get course details by CourseID, term and offer number
get.description: Returns details of a specific course for a given term, courseId , courseOfferingNumber.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional information like equivalent courses.

parameters.name: strm
parameters.description: The term code in the format YYYTS, where YYY is the year (e.g., 224 for the year 2024), T is the semester code (1 for spring, 4 for summer, 7 for fall), and S is the session code (A, B, C, etc.).

error.description: Error message for course not found.
Error message for internal server error.

get.summary: Get class details by term, subject, and catalog number
get.description: Returns details of classes for a given term, subject, and catalog number.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional information like instructor details.

parameters.name: catalogNumber
parameters.description: The catalog number of the course.

error.description: Error message for class not found.
Error message for internal server error.

get.summary: Get course details by term and optional filters (No pagination implemented)
get.description: Returns details of all courses for a given term and optional filters like courseId, ownedByCollege, ownedByDepartment, include equivalentCourses.

parameters.name: ownedByCollege
parameters.description: The academic organization code of the college.

parameters.name: ownedByDepartment
parameters.description: The academic organization code of the department.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional information like equivalent courses.

error.description: Error message for course not found.
Error message for internal server error.

get.description: Retrieve information about colleges including their descriptions, URLs, and current status.

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Include additional data such as non-current colleges, non-credit colleges, and full descriptions.

error.description: Error message for colleges not found.
Error message for internal server error.

StrmParam.description: The term code in the format YYYYT, where YYYY is the year (e.g., 2024 for the year 2024), T is the semester code (1 for spring, 4 for summer, 7 for fall), and S is the session code (A, B, C, etc.).

catalogNumber.description: The catalog number of the course.

primaryOwningDepartmentAcadOrg.description: The primary owning department academic organization.

primaryOwningParentCollegeAcadOrg.description: The primary owning parent college academic organization.

primaryOwningDepartmentDescription.description: Description of the primary owning department.

primaryOwningParentCollegeDescription.description: Description of the primary owning parent college.
primaryOwningParentCollegeDescription.example: Ira A. Fulton Schools of Engineering

catalogPrint.description: Indicates if the course is printable in the catalog.

fullDescription.example: Principles of problem solving using C++, algorithm design, structured programming, fundamental algorithms and techniques, and computer systems concepts. Social and ethical responsibility.

approvedUnitsMinimum.description: Minimum approved units for the course.

approvedUnitsMaximum.description: Maximum approved units for the course.

defaultUnitsMinimum.description: Minimum default units for the course.

defaultUnitsMaximum.description: Maximum default units for the course.

academicProgressUnits.description: Academic progress units for the course.

financialAidProgressUnits.description: Financial aid progress units for the course.

courseRepeatable.description: Indicates if the course is repeatable.

totalCompletionsAllowed.description: Total completions allowed for the course.

totalUnitsAllowed.description: Total units allowed for the course.

allowMultipleEnrollmentsInTerm.description: Indicates if multiple enrollments are allowed in a term.

greatestTermOffered.description: Greatest term in which the course is offered.

totalCompletionsAllowed.description: Total completions allowed for the topic.

totalUnitsAllowed.description: Total units allowed for the topic.

courseRepeatable.description: Indicates if the topic is repeatable.

graded.description: Indicates if the component is graded.

optional.description: Indicates if the component is optional.

primary.description: Indicates if the component is primary.

catalogNumber.description: The catalog number of the course.
The catalog number of the course.

schedulePrint.description: Indicates if the schedule is printable.

gradedComponent.description: Indicates if the component is graded.

promodShell.description: Indicates if it's a promod shell.

finalGradeRosterPosted.description: Indicates if the final grade roster is posted.

schedulePrint.description: Indicates if the schedule is printable.
